english: Bamsı, you became a source of hope for the oppressed people of these lands .

text: Benim halkım da bizim yanımızda olacaktır Bamsı'm.
english: My people will be on our side, Bamsi.

text: ...lakin evvela o soysuz deyyusun kellesi de Ural'ınki gibi alınacak.

my weapon is entrusted to our Ertuğrul Bey, mother.

He prepares the fortress for war.

text: Lakin gaddarlığı ve bana olan öfkesiyle kendini surların ardına hapsetmiştir.

text: Yiğitlerimizin canını kurtardınız. Allah sizden razı olsun.

blood of our martyrs will not be spilled in vain .

text: Ben Alplere talim ettiririm, onunla ilgilenemem.

you also place your brother among your Alps. You should serve in the

His father is a governor, my son.

text: Biraz dalgınsın, bir şey mi oldu?
english: You seem a little distracted, is something wrong?
Go and rest. I'll look after the baby.
He dedicated his life to science.
He never saw either my mother or my father.
He spent his life in foreign lands.
Just when we were happy, he arrived at his village.
He passed away from this world without ever seeing the light of day.
...walked straight and true according to Islamic morality. There
is no doubt about it, Hayme Ana. From
I will continue on his path. I
will safeguard what you have entrusted to me.
I will stand tall at the head of my tribe.
I will be a friend to whoever is a friend to me... and an enemy to whoever is an enemy to me.
This suits you perfectly, my daughter.
We will always be there for you.

text: Bundan böyle bir abin de Ertuğrul'dur.
english: From now on, you also have an older brother, Ertuğrul.
One of your sisters is Halime.
God be pleased with you. May you always be there for us, Mom
day I met Aliyar Bey... ...I saw

text: ...Aliyar Bey'in sayesinde bütün Türk obalarını bir araya topladı.

...I know Ertuğrul Bey is here, and so are you . Our

come in, Your Highness. My deepest condolences

text: Bunca yaşadığın acıdan sonra hâlâ vakur duruşunu bozmamışsın.
english: After all the pain you've been through, you still haven't lost your dignified composure.

text: Bu benim için ne büyük teselli.
english: This is such a great comfort to me.

text: Hele Ural, o hainin ettiklerinden sonra senin nasıl yiğit bir hatun olduğunu...
english: Especially Ural, after what that traitor did, I saw once again what a brave woman you are...

text: Ural layık olduğu yere gitmiştir Emir Hazretleri.
english: Ural has gone to where it belongs, Your Highness.
...he had given me the authority of governorship.

text: Toy kurulup yeni bey seçilene kadar...
english: Until the assembly is convened and a new leader is chosen...
...it is permissible for you to perform this duty.

text: Toy kurulduktan sonra da obamı yalnız koymayacağım.
english: Even after the gathering is established, I will not leave my tribe alone.

text: Çavdar Obası yurdum olmaya devam edecek.
english: Çavdar Obası will remain my homeland. Do

I know, Your Highness. When I finally gave in to
my father's wishes and agreed to become

text: ...sizin hatununuz olmayı kabul ettiğimde iki abim vardı.

text: Biri şehit, biri de helak oldu.

text: Abimin intikamı alınana kadar obamı başsız koymayacağım.

right person for a ruler who will become emperor when the time comes.

entire Çavdar tribe was left without a leader. It will be

A village without a leader will collapse and disappear.
(Ibn Arabi) Peace be upon you, Alps.
Sir, you have honored us with your presence. Here
Death is a celebration for the one who dies, but a sorrow for those who remain.
for those who drink the cup of martyrdom .

You are the ones who accept striving in the way of Allah
... it is essential not to overlook this point .

text: Ok ne kadar gerilirse o kadar ileri gider.

...the more pain they inflict upon you...

our Prophet, the master of all worlds,
peace and blessings be upon him, passed away,
Asap couldn't believe his master was leaving ...
But God's cause had to continue...
...the banner of Islam had to spread throughout the world.

text: Mübarek yüzünü örttü ve sahabenin huzuruna çıktı.
english: He covered his blessed face and appeared before the Companions.

text: ..."Kim ki Hazreti Muhammet sallallahü aleyhi ve selleme inanıyorsa...
english: "...Whoever believes in the Prophet Muhammad (peace and blessings be upon him)...

text: "Kim ki Allah'a ibaret ve kulluk ediyorsa...

Now, if he dies or is killed

... will not harm Allah in any way.
Allah will reward those who are grateful."

text: Bu sözler karşısında ashap sarsıldı ve yeniden kendilerine geldiler.

They embraced the cause of Islam.

Our marriage to Aslıhan Hatun, my Sultan.
